title: Destination 2024 Presidential Forums
overview: Univision News presents two Destination 2024 presidential forums with Republican nominee Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris. Each nominee will interact with undecided Hispanic voters and answer their questions. The special "Latinos Ask ... Donald Trump Responds" will air on Tuesday, October 8 at 10 p.m. ET from Miami, Fla. "Latinos Ask ... Kamala Harris Responds" will air Thursday, Oct. 10 at 10 p.m. ET from Las Vegas, Nev. Both events will be broadcast coast-to-coast with Spanish translation.Â
